p:
Stakeholders believe the Dutch EUPATI course should target a broad population of patient representatives, including somatic, psychiatric, and rare conditions. By doing so, it may complement the pre-existing, more disease-specific coaching and training programs that various patient organizations provide for their patient advocates. Dedicated and high-level training programs with contributions from relevant stakeholder parties have until now been exclusively directed at professionals.
2 The Dutch EUPATI course means that a “generic” and high-level training program on this topic, established in collaboration with and directed at patient representatives, will become available in the Netherlands for the first time.
